abstract: A veteran energy banker who recently left Citigroup has landed at Lexicon Partners, a corporate advisory boutique, as a senior adviser.
snippet: A veteran energy banker who recently left Citigroup has landed at Lexicon Partners, a corporate advisory boutique, as a senior adviser.
lead_paragraph: Henry “Hal” Clark, the former co-chairman of global power and utilities investment banking at Citigroup, has joined corporate advisory boutique Lexicon Partners as a senior adviser. The news was first reported late Wednesday on SparkSpread.com, an industry Web site, and was later confirmed in a Lexicon statement.

headline.main: Former Citi Energy Banker Lands at Lexicon
